entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023
